Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Daniel Helmer (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2015, off Alberto Arroyo (KC)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/5/2016 to a 5-year deal worth $11,000,000 per year...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 4/29/2016...
Injured on 9/17/2017 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2017, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2018, hitting .389 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Injured on 6/12/2019 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 9/22/2019...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2020, hitting .338 with 5 HR, 21 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/9/2021 to a 5-year deal worth $8,511,000 per year...
